comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Steve's right; it was a real quirkfest out there today. Odd goings-on at every turn. But we were undeterred in our quest to right old wrongs. You see, we realized we've been trespassing on upper Linden all these years in a _counter-clockwise_ direction. And, if we started riding it in a _clockwise_ direction, _voila!_, absolution, Brothers and Sisters! Sort of like putting the purloined candy bar _back_ on the shelf. Make sense? It does to Steve and me. DU
